mapper.select: select a.product_detail_no, b.product_no, a.img1, a.img2, a.img3, b.price, brand, name, content, with_product, amount from (SELECT product_detail.product_detail_no product_detail_no, stock.PSIZE psize, stock.AMOUNT amount, product_detail.PRODUCT_NO product_no, product_detail.WITH_PRODUCT with_product, product_detail.IMG1 img1,product_detail.IMG2 img2, product_detail.IMG3 img3, product_detail.COLOR_CODE color_code, product_detail.COLOR_CHIP color_chip from stock, product_detail where PRODUCT_DETAIL.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO = STOCK.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO) a, (SELECT * FROM product) b WHERE a.product_no = b.PRODUCT_NO AND a.product_no=#{value}

select b.product_no || '_'|| a.color_code product_detail_no, b.product_no, a.color_chip, a.color_code, psize, amount from (SELECT * from stock, product_detail where PRODUCT_DETAIL.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO = STOCK.PRODUCT_DETAIL_NO) a, (SELECT * FROM product) b WHERE a.product_no = b.PRODUCT_NO AND a.product_no=#{value}
